articles.description: Anyone with a home security device like a camera or smart doorbell will want to take note - a court has just ruled that one homeowner was invading his neighbour's privacy.
articles.content:
An urgent warning has been issued to anyone who owns a security cameras or Ring doorbell (or equivalent) following a landmark court case.

articles.title: Addison Lee guarantees drivers £5,000 in 1,000 hiring push - Evening Standard
